div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2132 Gibil Gabib, near Caltanissetta, 1928 Burial: c. 340-330 B.C. (K) Contents: 26 AR Catana: 1 tetradr. Leontini: 1 tetradr. Messana: 3 tetradr. Syracuse: 1 decadr.; 6 tetradr. Siculo-Punic: 2 tetradr. (Persephone/horse and palm-tree) Rash Melcarth: 3 tetradr. Pegasi Corinth: 4 (to Per. V with Ν) Ambracia: 1 (as Ravel 63) Anactorium: 1 (as BMC pl. 31, 16) Leucas: 2 (caduceus) Unc.: 1 (no symbol or letter) Disposition: Syracuse † Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, p. 226
